mainJobTitle: Full Stack Web and Mobile Developer
aboutMe1: I recently finished my bachelors in Computer Engineering from Pulchowk Engineering Campus, located at Pulchowk Lalitpur. I had a passion for computers from a very young age. And my only aim in life is to improve Nepal through IT sector.
aboutMe2: Currently I would like to think of myself as a Professional Frontend Developer as I have gained vast experience in frontend development by working in a number of companies and projects over the past 3-4 years. But I am comfortable handling the backend side of things as well.
